description:
Report length of borders.

For each border, print its length along the surface, in mm.  If a border has multiple parts, their lengths are summed before printing, unless -separate-pieces is specified.

The -corrected-areas option is intended for when the length is not meaningfully measurable on individual surfaces, it is only an approximate correction for the reduction in structure of a group average surface.

surface.title: surface
surface.description: the surface to measure the borders on

opt_corrected_areas_area_metric.title: opt_corrected_areas_area_metric
opt_corrected_areas_area_metric.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

opt_separate_pieces.title: opt_separate_pieces
opt_separate_pieces.description: report lengths for multi-part borders as separate numbers

opt_hide_border_name.title: opt_hide_border_name
opt_hide_border_name.description: don't print border name before each output
